name: Jetpack City Action VR
description:
"Jetpack City Action VR" game offers an experience that where you can fly between realistically modelled buildings and streets with your VR headset.

There are different things you can do in game, you can fly freely, or collect and deliver cargo, or fight against the killer drones, whatever you choose. Everything modelled realistically and 1/1 scale.

Thanks to rocket engine in which binded on your left hand controller, which you can trigger the thrusters and fly. You can boost your speed with "nitro" or you can fire projectiles from your right hand controller, where you can shoot against the killer drones.

You can feel the flight with less dizzines or motion sickness, since the game designed especially for to decrease the feelings of motion sickness, where the game environment have decreased contrast and avoid to player made hard turns, and optimized polygon count to help increase fps.

But please remember that game is still early access and experimental stage. Play as just for fun! And please share your ideas with us for how to improve the game much more better...
